member.name: T:Solid.Bootstrapping.IHaveContainer`1
member.summary: Represents an application whose architecture includes ioc container.
member.typeparam: The type of the ioc container.

member.name: T:Solid.Bootstrapping.IHaveContainerRegistrator
member.summary: Represents an application that has ioc container registrator.

member.name: T:Solid.Bootstrapping.IHaveContainerResolver
member.summary: Represents an application that has ioc container resolver (service locator).

member.name: T:Solid.Bootstrapping.IHaveRootObject`1
member.summary: Represents the root object of an application.
member.typeparam: The type of the root object.

member.name: T:Solid.Bootstrapping.IInitializable
member.summary: Represents an initializable object. Used during application bootstrapping.
